author: noel
msg: Added support for a list of gateway servers.  Change how gateway port is handled.  Change connect() error handling so that the delivery error count is incremented once for each pass through the possible set of servers, instead of for each server.  Minor cleanup to make the code more like HEAD.

author: noel
msg: Add toString(), equals(Object) and hashCode().  Only add a network if it isn't already present (equality, not set theory)

author: noel
msg: Log the IP ranges that will be matched instead of the text from the config file.

author: noel
msg: Added support for fast-fail rejection of relay requests.  Reduced calls to check permissions.

author: noel
msg: Minor optimization.  Cloning in the constructor is fastest.
